description.heading: The title of the modal
description.slot: The main content of the modal
description.top: Extra slot at the top of the modal (above title)
description.bottom: Extra slot at the bottom of the modal (below content)
description.isPanel: Removes padding, to enable a panel like behaviour.
description.id: A unique id which will be used to target the modal to open with the correct data-attr
description.animation: Which animation to use when opening  and closing the modal.
description.size: Empty as default is set to max width 800px. But you can use sm, md, lg and xl
